thread.title: Susan Griffin named new athletic director at St. Bernard
thread.title_full: Susan Griffin named new athletic director at St. Bernard

author: Marc Allard The Bulletin
title: Susan Griffin named new athletic director at St. Bernard
text: Susan Griffin named new athletic director at St. Bernard Comment By Marc Allard The Bulletin The Bulletin By Marc Allard The Bulletin Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 3:16 PM Updated at 3:16 PM By Marc Allard The Bulletin Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 3:16 PM Susan Griffin has been named the new athletic director at St. Bernard High School. She replaces interim athletic director Rob Roach. Check back for updates at NorwichBulletin.com By Marc Allard The Bulletin The Bulletin By Marc Allard The Bulletin Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 3:16 PM
